mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(detect_time, '%H') as time, COUNT(a.detect_time) as num FROM sd_radar_detect_data a WHERE detect_time >= (NOW() - interval 24 hour) and detect_time <= NOW() and tunnel_id = #{tunnelId} GROUP BY time

SELECT HOUR(t.time) hour, ifnull(sa.num,0) AS count FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB( NOW(),INTERVAL ( -(@i:=@i-1) ) HOUR ) ,'%Y-%m-%d %H') AS 'time' FROM ( SELECT a FROM (SELECT '1' AS a UNION SELECT '2' UNION SELECT '3' UNION SELECT '4' ) AS a JOIN ( SELECT '1' UNION SELECT '2' UNION SELECT '3' UNION SELECT '4' UNION SELECT '5' UNION SELECT '6' ) AS b ON 1 ) AS b ,(SELECT @i:=+1) AS i) AS t LEFT JOIN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB( b.detect_time,INTERVAL MINUTE(NOW())-60 MINUTE ) ,'%Y-%m-%d %H') AS date, count(b.vehicle_id) AS num FROM (SELECT a.vehicle_id,a.detect_time from sd_radar_detect_data a WHERE a.detect_time >= (NOW() - interval 25 hour) and tunnel_id = #{tunnelId} GROUP BY a.vehicle_id) b GROUP BY date ) AS sa ON sa.date = DATE_FORMAT( t.time,'%Y-%m-%d %H') GROUP BY t.time
